entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • So what is sendbuffersize supposed to do? seems like its just thrown away #98527
  • Large Memory Consumption in Docker Causing OOM #98524
  • [wasm] perf/aot regression in Normalize ASCII #98522
    9.0.0
  • Validate ILLink support for ref structs within generics #98519
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ICollection<> AddRange / RemoveRange #98509
  • Excessive exceptions generated in StackTraceSymbols when using Portable PDB #98506
  • WasmEnableThreads incrementalism is broken #98502
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled exception. System.Exception: Profilee returned exit code 139 instead of expected exit code 100 #98500
  • `DiagnosticSource` Filtering Behaviour #98499
  • Blocking scheme changes between 302 redirects #98497
  • [NativeAOT/arm32] punning test failure in Checked build #98493
  • Call to extension yield method is ignored if the returned values are discarded. #98489
  • [browser][WBT] DownloadResourceProgressTests.DownloadProgressFinishes #98486
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests #98507
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks #98505
  • [browser][MT] hybrid globalization #98483
    9.0.0
  • Stackoverflow on macOS x64 hangs #98477
  • Random.Shuffle fails on covariant array #98470

Closed

  • Blocking scheme changes between 302 redirects #98523
  • Building ILC causes double writes in the runtime build #89763
    9.0.0
  • possibly memory leak in .net 8 #96581
  • [android] .NET Preview 2, AOT w/ LLVM fails with `mini-llvm.c:8581, condition elems <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMS / 2' not met` #98501
    9.0.0
  • Add benchmarks for TensorPrimitives #98369
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WasmEnableThreads=true should fail without workload installed #98496
    9.0.0
  • Unified Build control update - runtime #74819
    9.0.0
  • [BUG] Cancellation token doesn't seem to respect the cancellation times #98452
  • Writing to `StreamWriter.Null` can cause exceptions #98457
    9.0.0
  • Decompression handler is case-sensitive #98236
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Stop using ThreadlessXunitTestRunner for MT unit tests #88763
    9.0.0
  • JIT: CSE for passthrough nodes CQ issue #98413
    9.0.0
  • .net 8.0.1 but reports 8.0.0 on arm 32 #97250
  • https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md #98478
  • Calling RequestReJIT in the profiler API can cause a deadlock #97771
    9.0.0
  • Tests crashing in CI with no dump: exit code 137 means SIGKILL Killed #97049
    9.0.0
  • Use IBC to Drive Partial NGEN and Tiered Compilation Behavior #10581
    Future
  • Implement Session-based Filtering for EventSource #11435
    Future
  • valgrind reports definitely lost bytes #11920
    Future
  • Performance regression: Span<Int32>.SequenceCompareTo 33% slower on x86 #13153
    Future
  • Process.WaitForExitAsync does not return when awaited process is killed if output is redirected #98347

PullRequests

Created

  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] New jiterpreter backbranch scan pass #98530
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Move isinst<exact> casts to the late phase #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor Compiler::optRedirectBlock; remove BasicBlock::CopyTarget #98526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #98525
    area-Meta
  • enable regions for MacOS #98521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a performance regression introduced by #97096. #98515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple StoreVector API's #98514
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add correct ImplementingType to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Delete suppressions against resolved issues #98512
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test On CI System.Runtime.TrimmingTests #98488
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #98485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Remove unnecessary assertion from emitOutputInstr #98484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update SDK to preview 1 release #98476
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Random.Shuffle covariance #98471
    area-System.Runtime

Merged

  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix debug info emitted for VLT_STK_REG/VLT_FPSTK variable locations #98479
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98465
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Change GetNameInfo early return to linear flow #98504
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Avoid double writes to PDB in NAOT publish #98342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Move reflection from JS to C# #98391
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • X509Chain.Build should throw when an internal error occurs #98435
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fold "cast(cast(obj, cls), cls)" to "cast(obj, cls)" #98337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm][workload] Require the workload for wasm threading #98498
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Tan #98299
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update unified build controls #98330
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Fix shift math helpers to mask the shift operand #98481
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make all StreamWriter.Null operations nops #98473
    area-System.IO
  • [browser][wbt] Print build info and ensure wasmEnableThreads is true in Blazor MT WBT #98490
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Free var_values table later #98482
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler's content encoding comparison case-insensitive #98475
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix "bump-chrome-pr.env" update. #98480
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Discard simple dominated CSEs that will never be defs #98417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify formatting strings for various "reason" fields #98434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock when we request a ReJIT due to an inlined method #98400
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix exceptions thrown by LDiv/LMod helpers #98474
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HX_3A_B` to `SVE_JL_3A` and `SVE_IC_3A` to `SVE_IC_3A_C` #98332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Forward the pgoinstrument argument to the inner build for VMR/Source-build builds #98446
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't strip pointed-to type information in IL stubs #98392
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.PopCount #98281
    area-System.Numerics
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono] Block SIMD types in Swift interop #98429
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Cse new candidate strategy #98467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT publish fails on fi_FI.utf8 locale #38806
  • .NET 8 SDK stopped building projects in Linux: `You must install or update .NET to run this application` #38794

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2372344 #38813
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the Feb 8.0.2 runtime #38812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MSBuild CLI in the test framework to get Property/Item data #38811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #38735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Valleysoft.DockerCredsProvider from SourceBuildPrebuiltBaseline.xml #38803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse SdkFeatureBand from .version file #38802
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2379710 #38800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2379624 #38795
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2378822 #38776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branding
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #38734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #38733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #38729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `Lock` object speclet #7943

Merged

  • Meetings 2024 Feb/March #7920
  • Update LDM agenda #7940

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add public API to obtain a location specifier for a call #72133
    17.10
  • GeneratorDriverState should replace TrackIncrementalSteps/DisabledOutputs fields with properties #72129
  • Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #72124
  • Copy/Paste does not preserve semantics when multiple types with the same name exist #72122
  • Spread Operator with possible null value gives no compile time warning if nullable enabled #72121
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.9.0 #72117
  • [C#] Nested curly brace is not auto completed in interpolated string #72116

Closed

  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName could run faster if the tree stored a bit on nodes that contained attributes or not. #72066
  • Add `IParameterSymbol.IsParamCollection` property #71816
  • MsBuildWorkspace throws exception when netcoreapp2.1 app is loaded #71919

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove legacy unit testing type #72132
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always visit conversions in array initializers #72131
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup handling of flags in internal syntax nodes. #72130
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fallback to solution options #72126
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support more than one frozen source generated document at once #72115
    Area-IDE
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address more PROTOTYPE comments #72113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Add dedicated bit for indicating if a node itself has annotations (versus its children). #72104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Warn when converting to Lock subtype #72119
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Forward the call to global option service #72128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. Use additional bit to store if nodes contain attributes within them. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Rename `Lock.EnterScope` method #72118
    New Feature - Lock Type
  • Add `Lock` type to the compiler test plan #72120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Remove .NET 7 install step #72100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature to Language Feature Status.md #72125
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reuse compilation tracker states when possible. #72111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unify handling of constant and not constant chars during string concat #72086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProducesResponseType should support setting a Description #54064
  • Blazor generic component with CascadingParameter does not update displayed value, even when the value changes in code #54063
  • init setter to have the same visibility as the most visible constructor, rather than the containing type #54059
  • Blazor 8 reverse proxy signin-oidc not working. #54057
  • GetUriByAction without HttpContext cannot be used normally. #54054
  • Expose client identity when leveraging Kestrel for IPC over named pipes or *nix domain sockets. #54053
  • Why is UUID performance slightly worse than other frameworks? #54050

Closed

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Form With Multiple Buttons Inconsistent Behavior #53993
  • [DataProtection] Hang at application start when trying to get DataProtection key from Azure KeyVault #53989
  • How to configure .NET 8 AspNetCore Identity with Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) as external provider using OpenIdConnect #52913
  • Error while setting render mode on Generic Blazor Component #54058
  • Only submit 1 AntiforgeryToken in Blazor SSR mode #54022
  • .NET 8 Blazor - OnChange() Migration To Static Rendering #54018
  • [Blazor Hybrid] Mouse does not work on the Second Monitor #54052
  • HttpContext.AuthenticateAsync do not return "sub" claim after update to .NET 8 #52940

PullRequests

Created

  • Add option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54062
    area-blazor
  • [Infrastructure] Fix NPM packaging #54056
    area-signalr

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Avoid downloading browsers during source build #54036
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #4515
  • Validate format options in dotnet-trace convert #4514

Merged

  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #4513

Updated

  • Change provider defaults for dotnet-trace #4512
    dotnet-trace, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet command not found MAC OS #20629
  • WebView error if we leave page while it's navigating #20627
  • Activity class {com.companyname.polnk/companyname.mymauiapp.activity} does not exist. #20626
  • [Testing] Update to latest RC.5 of Appium #20624
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Testing] Template tests xharness issues #20623
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid - Allow `window.open()` from JavaScript to automatically open a `WebView` #20622
    Backlog
  • GeoLocation.GetLocationAsync() failing on sequential calls after initially getting the location. #20620
    Backlog
  • Support compiled bindings for generic ViewModels #20616
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView selecteditem background lost if collectionview (or parent) IsEnabled changed. #20615
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20614
    Backlog
  • Webview on iOS and Android does not allow local HTML to load additional resources #20613
  • Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region. #20612
    Backlog
  • It's impossible to change the scroll position when starting the application. #20611
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView EndInteraction Event dont show which Touchpoint has been ended #20609
  • Custom CommandProperty always null on binding #20608
  • TemplatedCell.UpdateSelectionColor() Object reference not set to an instance of an object error #20607
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException in TemplatedCell #20606
    Backlog
  • Splash Screen Image doesn't fit across devices with different Android Versions #20605
  • Splash Screen does not update iOS #20604
  • No content inside PDF which is loaded in Customwebview in MAUI application on Android #20603

Closed

  • Allow Changing AppShell at runtime #20628
  • Getting AOT/Precompiling error when building in release mode [Android] #20602
  • TableView with Picker #5924
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true still does not toggle the first time on Android #20549
  • Problems with .NET Maui Hybrid Blazor Foreground Service #20303
  • [ci] Xharness fails to install application to run Device Tests and UITests #20107
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Keyboard covers content at bottom of screen in a ScrollView #20200
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Sticky header panel covers content in a scrollview when using ReturnType="Next" on Entry fields #19956
  • iOS Linker removes support for PCLCrypto.SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.GetAlgorithm #20583
  • XamlC XC0022 error : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified. #20568

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conversion overflow exception on insert or update a decimal value with DECIMAL(38,10) #33109
  • Duplicated records returned in a projection #33105
  • Entityframeworkcore 8 is not backward compatible with Entityframeworkcore 5.0.17, getting compile time error #33104
  • Integrate precompiled query generation into the build process #33103
    9.0.0
  • Q: HasConversion Overloads and confusing behavior #33102

PullRequests

Created

  • Rewrite the funcletizer to support precompiled queries #33106

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33090
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33089
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
  • 32943-Sugar for HierarchyId path generation #33062
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complextypes with TPH entities #33054
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33048
    Servicing-approved
